q1: How many matches will Arsenal win in this season's Premier League?
a1: I think that it is reasonable to expect Arsenal to win 22-25 games this season.
a2: Has Emery revealed what he told players at half time against Manchester?
q3: I think they can lose anywhere between 5-10 games
a3: They are not perfect so they will lose, but I do not think there are many games.
q4: totally agree that they will lose, because they are not perfect, they will lose between 7-11 games
a4: Have they got potential to win their next game?
a5: yes, Arsenal has the potential to beat anyone
